endpoints.name: service
endpoints.title: Get service API details
endpoints.description: This document, which describes this service in detail.

endpoints.name: get
endpoints.title: Get score(s) data
endpoints.description: Get score(s) matching the given query parameters. Returns all trophies if no parameters are provided. Example: /get?teamId=SomeTeamId&mazeId=3:3:3:Seed

endpoints.name: insert
endpoints.title: Insert a score document
endpoints.description: Insert the JSON representation of a Score object into the scores collection. Full score object must be passed via document body.

endpoints.name: update
endpoints.title: Update a score document
endpoints.description: Update an existing score in the database. Full score object must be passed via document body.

endpoints.name: delete
endpoints.title: Delete a score document
endpoints.description: Delete score(s) matching the given query parameters. Example: /delete/SomeScoreId

arguments.name: scoreId
arguments.description: scoreId is a string GUID that identifies the score document.
